dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: Now that you have met yourself, shall we see what you truly are?

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: Close your eyes. Let the dream take you.

actions.action: sits with newfound wholeness, still glowing from integration
moves behind Evan, hands hovering near temples
cafe walls begin to shimmer and become translucent
eyes flutter closed as reality shifts into dream

environment.description: Liminal cafe space transforming into gateway, walls becoming membranes between waking and dreaming
environment.mood: hypnotic threshold, reality softening into vision
